Only knights actually using the shield will drop it - Balder Knights using theÂ [[Buckler]] will drop that instead. It can also be purchased from the [[Crestfallen Merchant]] in [[Sen's Fortress]] for 4,000 [[soul]]s. ==Characteristics== The Balder Shield has the second highest base [[stability]] of all medium shields and is therefore one of the strongest shields against physical attacks early in the game. Later on, however, the [[Silver Knight Shield]] exceeds it in most respects, having 1 more stability and better elemental resistances while also being easier to max upgrade. It does weigh slightly less and have lower stat requirements. It has a medium deflection and normal [[Parry and Riposte|parry]] speed.
